SEARCH
Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.observer

Interface Listener

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameDynamic, GameListenersSocket
public interface Listener extends Remote
Remote interface for listeners observing game events. Implementations of this interface will receive notifications about various events occurring in the game.

  • Method Details

    • starterCardPlaced

      void starterCardPlaced(ModelView model, Orientation orientation, String nick) throws RemoteException
      Notifies that a starter card has been placed.
      Parameters:
      model - The current state of the game.
      orientation - The orientation in which the card is placed.
      nick - The nickname of the player who placed the card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • cardChosen

      void cardChosen(ModelView model, int which_card) throws RemoteException
      Notifies that a card has been chosen.
      Parameters:
      model - The current state of the game.
      which_card - The index of the chosen card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • cardPlaced

      void cardPlaced(ModelView model, int where_to_place_x, int where_to_place_y, Orientation orientation) throws RemoteException
      Notifies that a card has been placed on the game board.
      Parameters:
      model - The current state of the game.
      where_to_place_x - The x-coordinate where the card is placed.
      where_to_place_y - The y-coordinate where the card is placed.
      orientation - The orientation in which the card is placed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • successfulMove

      void successfulMove(ModelView model, Coordinate coord) throws RemoteException
      Notifies that a move was successfully executed.
      Parameters:
      model - The current state of the game.
      coord - The coordinate where the successful move was made.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

      void showOthersPersonalBoard(ModelView modelView, String playerNickname, int playerIndex) throws RemoteException
      Notifies to show the personal board of another player.
      Parameters:
      modelView - The current state of the game.
      playerNickname - The nickname of the player whose board to show.
      playerIndex - The index of the player in the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.
